text: @WhiteHouse #BreakingNews @realDonaldTrump in a town hall on @FoxNews is pushing the concept of ending stay at home orders and social distancing to save the economy, against all medical experts. The #CoronavirusPandemic could kill 1.4 million Americans conservatively. https://t.co/TdtzGUu4wo

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
